title: Online Parent Education Design: Service-Learning-Based Collaborative Project

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital collaboration tools (Google Docs, video conferencing, etc.) and fundamental understanding of child-rearing
context.additional_context: Learners (medical/legal/technical professionals) engage in a service-learning project designing real-world parent education programs using online collaboration tools, operating through a blended model of self-directed asynchronous collaboration and real-time communication

learning_goals: Learners can finalize the design process of a parent education program using online collaboration tools (Google Docs, video conferencing, etc.)
Learners can develop three or more educational contents reflecting effective communication strategies with adolescents
Learners can improve their designed educational materials at least twice based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
